gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pelicans 116, Hawks 103
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pelicans defeated the Hawks, 116-103. Trey Murphy III led the way for the Pelicans with 28 points (6-13 3PT FG) and seven rebounds, while Zion Williamson added 27 points, six rebounds and seven assists in the victory. Dejounte Murray tallied 23 points and 11 assists for the Hawks in the losing effort. The Pelicans have won four games in a row as they improve to 39-25 on the season, while the Hawks fall to 29-35.
